LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Base_T1.label: Orkish Kulture
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Base_T1.description: The Ork way of life is as straightforward and brutal as the Orks themselves. Much like their approach to everything else, Orks do not waste time pondering why they do things, or how they might do them better. Instead they simply act, the fundamental tenet of their society is a simple one that even the most pea-brained Snotling can understand -- might makes right.
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Base_T2.label: Mek Tek
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Base_T2.description: Allowz da mekz ta make some wargear an shootaz wiv even more Dakka!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Base_T3.label: Big Mek Brainz
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Base_T3.description: Allowz da mekz ta make some fancy wargear an da best shootaz wiv da most Dakka!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Weapons_Melee_T1.label: Brutality
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Weapons_Melee_T1.description: Allowz da boyz ta make propa Choppaz!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Weapons_Melee_T2.label: Extreme Brutality
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Weapons_Melee_T2.description: Allowz da boyz ta make bigga, betta Choppaz!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Weapons_Ranged_T2.label: More Dakka
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Weapons_Ranged_T2.descriptio: Allowz da boyz ta make betta Shootaz!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel.label: Clovin
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel.description: Allowz da boyz ta make Clovin and Leva Arma!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Wargear_T1.label: Nob bitz
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Wargear_T1.descripti: Allowz da boyz ta make stuff fer Nobz!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T1.label: Arma
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T1.descriptio: Allowz da boyz ta make betta Arma!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T2.label: Eavy Arma
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T2.descriptio: Allowz da mekz ta make Eavy Arma!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Wargear_T2.label: Boss bitz
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Wargear_T2.descripti: Allowz da boyz ta make stuff fer da Boss!
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T3.label: Mega Arma
LanguageData.OG_Ork_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T3.descriptio: Allowz da mekz ta make Mega Arma!
